original_title: Linkin Park: The Hunting Party - Live from Mexico
overview: The Hunting Party: Live from Mexico includes the live version of various songs from all the studio albums by Linkin Park, such as Hybrid Theory, Meteora, Minutes to Midnight, A Thousand Suns and Living Things.  The concert footage was shot on June 12, 2012 at Arena Monterrey, Monterrey, Nuevo Le√≥n, Mexico. The band won the MTV award for the best World Stage in 2013 for this concert.
title: Linkin Park: The Hunting Party - Live from Mexico
